Albania: Shkodër fell to the Ottoman Empire in Fourth siege of Shkodra the Albanians were helped by venice but still lost.
Belgium: Battle of Guinegate: forces of Mary of Burgundy and her husband Maximilian I of Habsburg defeat forces of Louis XI of France.
Spain: War of the Castilian Succession: The war ended. The reign of Ferdinand began. By the Treaty of Alcáçovas, Portugal recognized Spanish control of the Canary Islands.
Vietnam: The Đại Việt sử ký toàn thư, an official history of Đại Việt, was completed.
